alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 3:36PM PST until December 22 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 3000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 20 mph. * WHERE...Cascade mountains and valleys of Snohomish and King Counties, including Stevens Pass, and Snoqualmie Pass. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on very difficult travel. Pass closures have been reported. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Check with WSDOT for the latest on Pass closure statuses, road conditions and travel alerts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes
